messages.subject: Hikosaburo biography
messages.msgSnippet: Hi all - Does anyone out there have a used hardcover copy of the biography, Kuirhara Hikosaburo Akihide? I gave mine to a friend last year and would like to
messages.messageBody:
Hi all -

Does anyone out there have a used hardcover copy of the biography, "Kuirhara Hikosaburo Akihide?" I gave mine to a friend last year and would like to replace it. Please contact me off-list: swords@...

Ron
STL

[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]
